title: BAFTA Games Awards 2024 Winners: The Full List | Flipboard
text: BAFTA Games Awards 2024 Winners: The Full List Baldur's Gate 3, Alan Wake 2, and Super Mario Bros. Wonder are among the games that took home prizes. The 2024 BAFTA Games Awards have come and gone … Related storyboards More stories from [Gaming](/topic/gaming) - Storyboard LASIK Patient Issues Dire Warning About Getting The ProcedureCurated byDaily Dot [An estimated 20-25 million LASIK procedures have been performed on Americans, but as TikToker Lainey Ostrom (@laineyostrom) can attest, there’s always a chance it can go wrong. As part of a “Get Ready With Me” video, Ostrom opened up about how LASIK is one of her “biggest regrets in life.”](/@dailydot/lasik-patient-issues-dire-warning-about-getting-the-procedure-7ofn1kju7mhef2so) [The "infinite ammo, never reload" Helldivers 2 loadout has made fighting the Automatons so much more fun that I can never go back](/topic/gaming/the-infinite-ammo-never-reload-helldivers-2-loadout-has-made-fighting-the-aut/a-nFNRZQO6Q2ORaoWMfPxgbQ%3Aa%3A2413451384-d98a96db3d%2Fgamesradar.com) I don't like reloading.
